content: Ti(OiPr)4 was obtained from ABCR and used as received. Ti(OiPr)4 (1.1 cm3, 3.8 mmol) was added to a solution of 590 mg of 4-(imidazol-1-yl)butyric acid (3.8 mmol) [24] in 3 cm3 of water-free isopropyl alcohol under argon. Crystals of 1 were obtained after 4 weeks (yield 450 mg, 31 %). 1H NMR (CDCl3, 250 MHz): δ = 1.21 (d, 18H, CH3), 1.83 (2H, CH2), 2.05 (2H, CH2), 3.78 (2H, CH2), 4.70 (3H, CH3), 6.74 (1H, CH), 7.17 (1H, CH), 7.59 (1H, CH) ppm; 13C NMR (CDCl3, 62.90 MHz): δ = 25.96 (CH3), 26.69 (CH2), 32.64 (CH2), 46.67 (CH2), 77.36 (CHMe2), 118.29 (CH), 129.75 (CH), 138.07 (CH), 186.50 (COO) ppm; IR (ATR): ν¯\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ \bar{\nu } $$\end{document} = 3,144 (vw), 2,963 (w), 2,927 (vw), 2,860 (vw), 1,724 (vvw), 1,591 (m), 1,540 (m), 1,520 (w), 1,462 (m), 1,443 (w), 1,373 (w), 1,359 (w), 1,327 (w), 1,226 (w), 1,161 (w), 1,118 (s), 1,084 (m), 1,020 (w), 980 (m), 942 (w), 845 (w), 764 (w), 733 (m), 665 (w) cm−1; IR (CHCl3): ν¯\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ \bar{\nu } $$\end{document} = 2,971 (s), 2,930 (m), 2,864 (w), 1,639 (m), 1,570 (s), 1,513 (w), 1,441 (m), 1,376 (s), 1,283 (w), 1,126 (s), 1,071 (m), 1,042 (w), 1,004 (m), 946 (m), 911 (w), 888 (w), 853 (w) cm−1.

Titanium tris(isopropoxo) 4-(imidazol-1-yl)butanate (1)

Ti(OiPr)4 was obtained from ABCR and used as received. Ti(OiPr)4 (1.1 cm3, 3.8 mmol) was added to a solution of 590 mg of 4-(imidazol-1-yl)butyric acid (3.8 mmol) [24] in 3 cm3 of water-free isopropyl alcohol under argon. Crystals of 1 were obtained after 4 weeks (yield 450 mg, 31 %). 1H NMR (CDCl3, 250 MHz): δ = 1.21 (d, 18H, CH3), 1.83 (2H, CH2), 2.05 (2H, CH2), 3.78 (2H, CH2), 4.70 (3H, CH3), 6.74 (1H, CH), 7.17 (1H, CH), 7.59 (1H, CH) ppm; 13C NMR (CDCl3, 62.90 MHz): δ = 25.96 (CH3), 26.69 (CH2), 32.64 (CH2), 46.67 (CH2), 77.36 (CHMe2), 118.29 (CH), 129.75 (CH), 138.07 (CH), 186.50 (COO) ppm; IR (ATR): ν¯\documentclass[12pt]{minimal}     \usepackage{amsmath}     \usepackage{wasysym}     \usepackage{amsfonts}     \usepackage{amssymb}     \usepackage{amsbsy}     \usepackage{mathrsfs}     \usepackage{upgreek}     \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt}     \begin{document}$$ \bar{\nu } $$\end{document} = 3,144 (vw), 2,963 (w), 2,927 (vw), 2,860 (vw), 1,724 (vvw), 1,591 (m), 1,540 (m), 1,520 (w), 1,462 (m), 1,443 (w), 1,373 (w), 1,359 (w), 1,327 (w), 1,226 (w), 1,161 (w), 1,118 (s), 1,084 (m), 1,020 (w), 980 (m), 942 (w), 845 (w), 764 (w), 733 (m), 665 (w) cm-1; IR (CHCl3): ν¯\documentclass[12pt]{minimal}     \usepackage{amsmath}     \usepackage{wasysym}     \usepackage{amsfonts}     \usepackage{amssymb}     \usepackage{amsbsy}     \usepackage{mathrsfs}     \usepackage{upgreek}     \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt}     \begin{document}$$ \bar{\nu } $$\end{document} = 2,971 (s), 2,930 (m), 2,864 (w), 1,639 (m), 1,570 (s), 1,513 (w), 1,441 (m), 1,376 (s), 1,283 (w), 1,126 (s), 1,071 (m), 1,042 (w), 1,004 (m), 946 (m), 911 (w), 888 (w), 853 (w) cm-1.
